page.title: 14Living in a small village
page.content: Living in a small village is satisfactory if a person has a car as it is necessary to travel for many amenities. There are local events such a concerts, socials, coffee evenings and a floral club in the Parish Hall. But the Women's Institute and Young Farmers Clubs are based in the neighbouring village of {Kirklinton.} There are no shops and the nearest doctor's surgery is in {Brampton} or{ {Longtown}six miles away. ******* Form 2G of Eden School, Rickerby, Carlisle particularly wish to thank Mrs. Kate Little, Mr. John Hardy, Rev.Ronald Leatherbarrow, Mrs. E. Watson and the staff of Carlisle City Library for their help.
